main.name: Bhavin Shah
main.bio: Aspiring Information Technology Specialist with a Cybersecurity degree at Kean University. Inventive, multi-tasking, and organized IT specialist with technical skills of MS Office, Adobe Creative Cloud, etc. and knowledge of detail-oriented production plans that accomplish project goals. I am excited for opportunities and challenges that will not only better my work, but also myself.
main.contactmessage: Please feel free to contact me by phone or email

resume.skillmessage: Here are some of my favorite tools and technologies to work with

work.title: Genius Administrator
work.description: As a Genius Admin I assist and manage workflows to ensure high tempo and short turnaround time on repair queues. Provide daily feedback correcting inconsistencies in note taking, inventory allocation, and core competencies. I am a daily resource, taking time to acknowledge changes in policy and communicating said changes to better team knowledge. Perform troubleshooting to various mobile devices. Serve as the point of contact between the store and customers, making pickup calls and repair updates. I am also one of the primary contacts in-store for pickups.

work.title: Technical Specialist
work.description: As a Technical Specialist, I help new owners get started and current ones get quick, efficient support â€” developing strong, positive relationships with Apple. When a customer needs assistance, I quickly assess their situation. Sometimes I take care of customers with advice or a solution on the spot, using my knowledge of current Apple technology to help with iPod, iPhone, and iPad devices. At other times, I refer customers to support team members who get them up and running again. I even provide personal advice for new customers, helping them acquire the basic skills they need to get started on photo, video, and music projects.

work.title: System Administrator
work.description: Assisting with helping officers with problems in Windows and Mac based Operating Systems. Also helping with troubleshooting network printers/scanner issues. Helping to also aid any difficulties in Microsoft Office and any other University softwares.
